home.hero.subtitle: Secure. Efficient. Transparent. Report incidents with confidence.
home.hero.tagline: Empowering Communities, One Report at a Time
home.features.title: Core Features
home.features.secureReporting.title: Secure Crime Reporting
home.features.secureReporting.descriptio: Report incidents online while maintaining anonymity and safety.
home.features.tracking.title: Real-Time Complaint Tracking
home.features.tracking.description: Track the status of your complaint using unique IDs with live updates.
home.features.caseManagement.title: Case Management
home.features.caseManagement.description: Officers can manage investigations, assign tasks, and update progress.
home.features.evidenceHandling.title: Evidence Handling
home.features.evidenceHandling.descripti: Digital storage of photos, documents, and files tied to each case securely.
home.features.officerDashboard.title: Officer Dashboard
home.features.officerDashboard.descripti: Dedicated tools for law enforcement to manage reports and communication.
home.features.safetyPrivacy.title: User Safety & Privacy
home.features.safetyPrivacy.description: Top-tier protection of user identity and data through encrypted protocols.
home.howItWorks.title: How It Works
home.howItWorks.submit.title: Submit a Report
home.howItWorks.submit.description: Fill in details of the incident with or without personal information.
home.howItWorks.track.title: Track Progress
home.howItWorks.track.description: Use the unique tracking ID to check your report's progress anytime.
home.howItWorks.notify.title: Get Notified
home.howItWorks.notify.description: Receive timely updates on investigations and outcomes securely.
home.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
home.faq.q1.question: What happens after I report a crime?
home.faq.q1.answer: Your report is received by law enforcement, and an investigation is initiated. You can track the progress using your complaint ID.
home.faq.q2.question: Is my identity protected?
home.faq.q2.answer: Yes. All reports can be made anonymously. If contact is needed, encrypted communication methods are used.
home.faq.q3.question: Can I report on someone else's behalf?
home.faq.q3.answer: Absolutely. The system allows third-party reporting to ensure no crime goes unnoticed.
